DIA_GameMaster_Welcome_03_01: Young man, would you like to take part in a devilishly difficult game? This is your only chance to come in with nothing and leave like a king!
DIA_GameMaster_Welcome_03_02: The rules are simple, you must carefully watch where the gold coin moves and point out under which mug it is hiding.
DIA_GameMaster_Welcome_Yes_03_02: Great! How much would you like to bet on your victory? Three times the amount you bid will be available to win.
DIA_GameMaster_Welcome_No_03_02: As you wish, such an opportunity will not come again.
